extendedInfo.description: If you are over age 40 and liked computers in the decade of 80, surely you liked the TRS-80 games.It was also by enjoying these games that I decided to make this one because I loved playing it and would like to have it on my phone.Is not yet complete, missing some details to look more like the original.But I am very happy to have been able to reach this point in the game, which you can already kill the longing and distributes it to those who enjoyed this season and also for younger people know what we played.As I said, the game is not yet complete, but the extent possible I will updating it.Hope you enjoy and have fun.Do not forget to give your opinions on the game.Tags RETRO , ANTIGO , VIDEOGAME , ATAR , DOS

reviews.title: Well Done
reviews.comment: Well this did make me smile .... spent many hours playing this on the TRS80 back in the day ... very well done full five stars!
reviews.author: Simon Postle

reviews.title: It\'s pretty alright.
reviews.comment: However, the control buttons are switched from the standard (movement on the left, action on the right). I\'m a lefty and it still feels weird. Additionally, the buttons are REALLY small on a phone. A larger size option would be nice. Other than that, pretty groovy simple old-school game.
reviews.author: Erin D

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This is really retro looking and plays pretty well. I never had a TRS80 but this game is good. It\'s not as slow as a snail and the invaders even break rank (like Galaga). Excellent!
reviews.author: David Rhodes

reviews.title: TRS-80 Goodness!
reviews.comment: Looks and plays like it did on the TRS-80 model 1. Very well done retro game.   Original sounds and everything!
reviews.author: Kevin Adams
